text: i joined aws after a decade of
experience working at different hardware
vendors and consulting companies and
when i first saw amazon ec2 with the
on-demand access and the prc gold model
i immediately thought this was the next
big thing in the it industry
and i wanted to be part of it so i first
started at aws it was in luxembourg in
2013 and i was the very first european
technical trainer
we hired more trainers i quickly became
training manager for the team of emir
trainers across europe middle east and
africa i then met amazon alexa during a
hackathon and i decided i wanted to work
with that technology so i moved to
london to join the alexa skill solution
architect team and we were just a small
team of three at the time but again as
the team grew i became solution
architect team leader for uk and then
for europe i learned a lot working with
voice technology but in my heart i was
still missing a bit aws so when i heard
about my dream role being open in france
i applied i got the role and i moved to
paris
now
this all may sound straightforward but
this is worth noting that before i got
my first role as a technical trainer i
had applied twice already for different
roles and did not get the jobs so the
morale of this story is if your
application is not successful the first
time keep trying because once you're in
amazon you can go mostly anywhere
